content: field guide hat and mitts | by plucky knitter these unisex hat and mitts are made for each other the hat is a bit slouchy and the mitts are just the right length for whatever your day holds the large diamond motif echoes the pattern in the field guide scarf you might choose to knit each piece by itself or knit the hat and mitts to compliment your scarf for a beautiful three-piece set yarn materials hat hat plucky knitter snug worsted 70% merino 20% cashmere size us 7 4 5 mm 16 / 40 cm circular circ needle and double pointed 10% alpaca 230 yards / 210 m per 115 g urban 1 skein needles dpns or size necessary to obtain gauge approx 200 yd / 175 m of worsted weight yarn size us 5 3 75 mm 16 / 40 cm circular circ needle mitts mitts size us 4 3 5 mm dpns plucky knitter snug worsted 70% merino 20% cashmere size us 6 4 0 mm dpns or size necessary to obtain gauge 10% alpaca 230 yards / 210 m per 115 g pumpkin patch both 1 skein approx 75 yd / 50 m of worsted weight yarn marker cable needle size tapestry needle hat 16 3/4 18½ 20 / 42 5 46 5 51 cm circumference 9 10 10½ / 23 25 5 26 5 cm tall gauge mitts 20 sts and 29 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in women s size 8 / 20 cm circumference 8 11 / 20 28 cm tall diamond pattern on larger needles man s size 9 5 / 25 cm circumference 8 11 / 20 28 cm tall stitch guide mitt directions for both mitts diamond pattern note directions for the man s size are in parenthesis worked in the round over 10 sts round 1 *k10 repeat from * to end using us 4 3 5 mm needles co 40 50 sts pm and join in round 2 *k3 rt lt k3 repeat from * to end the round being careful not to twist the sts round 3 *k4 p2 k4 repeat from * to end round 4 *k2 rt k2 lt k2 repeat from * to end next round *kl p1 repeat from * around round 5 *k3 p4 k3 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 until ribbing meas 1 / 2 5 cm from co edge round 6 *k1 rt k4 lt k1 repeat from * to end work rnds 1 -
